title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 204.11 - Disbursement of funds
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 204.11 - Disbursement of funds

State Regulations

Disbursement of funds shall be made in the manner described
in the act and in the rules and regulations promulgated by the commissioner to
effectuate the provisions and intent of the act, and in accordance with the
provisions of this program. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
204.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
